p: In a study carried out in Bogota, Colombia, a total of 13,488 samples of children hospitalized with a diagnosis of respiratory infection were tested for RSV during 5 years and 4,559 (33.8%) were found positive. The average age of patients analyzed in the study was 9.2 Â± 8.5 months, and 71.7% of cases of HRSV infection occurred in the period from March to May, whereas 50% of the bronchiolitis cases were diagnosed from April to June during the years of the study [ 47].
